column5: Sorry if this has been asked before, but I see advice on getting bait going through IF, but not much for where to get bait going from Mpls/St. Paul through Duluth-Thunder Bay and on to Hearst Air. Any places you reccommend for nightcrawlers, possibly minnows? Probably leaning toward salted minnows as they would be easier to keep. Any places you recommend?

I've picked up salted minnows at Fish Lake Bait in the past. It's just off 35 on the way to Duluth. You probably need to order salted minnows in advance. http://www.fishlakebaitharris.com Or, depending on what part of the Cities you're coming from, Vados Bait on 65 in Spring Lake Park is a good spot for frozen minnows. https://www.vadosbait.com/index.php
I will second the Fish Lake Bait in Harris Minnesota. Just off of I35 @ mile marker 152. Good advice to call ahead as that is what I do and they have always been ready. Later, Jay
If you are headed west out of TB, Larry's in Kakabeka Falls 807-473-9321. Right on the highway.
